thread.title: Happy! This is the complete list of Okezone Table Tennis Champions 2024
thread.title_full: Happy! This is the complete list of Okezone Table Tennis Champions 2024

author: archyworldyscom
title: Happy! This is the complete list of Okezone Table Tennis Champions 2024
text:
loading…
PDAM emerged as the 2024 Okezone Table Tennis Champion after defeating Jasa Raharja Putera A in the final round with a score of 2-0 at GOR Pertamina Simprug, Jakarta, on Saturday (31/8/2024). Photo/Wkanto Arungbudoyo
JAKARTA – PDAM to come out as a champion Table tennis Okezone 2024 after defeating Jasa Raharja Putera A in the final round with a score of 2-0 at GOR Pertamina Simprug, Jakarta on Saturday (31/8/2024). PDAM’s victory was confirmed by Titin in the women’s singles who successfully defeated Lany in three sets, 10-12, 12-10, 11-4 and 11-9.
Meanwhile, PUPR Ministry occupies the third place after beating Jasa Marga in the race for third place with a score of 2-0!
With these results, PUPR Ministry has the right to take home a trophy and IDR 3 million in cash. Jasa Marga herself pocketed IDR 2 million in cash and a trophy.
The best fan category went to BRIN and PDAM. They never stop expressing their support, so they deserve to be rewarded with a cash prize worth 500 thousand IDR.
The 2024 Okezone Table Tennis event was attended by 34 teams from companies, government agencies and media. The competition for the championship rankings was fierce from the round of 32.
Below is the list of Okezone Table Tennis Champions 2024:
1st place: PDAM
2nd place: Jasa Raharja Putera
3rd place: Ministry of PUPR
4th place: Jasa Marga
Best fan: BRIN and PDAM
(wib)
#Happy #complete #list #Okezone #Table #Tennis #Champions
